anya-e0702n9:2_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero mahādhammarakkhittheraṁ mahāraṭṭhaṁ pesesi,-
anya-e0702n9:2_1: tvaṁ etaṁ raṭṭhaṁ gantvā ettha sāsanaṁ patiṭṭhāpesīti.
anya-e0702n9:3_0: Mahādhammarakkhitattheroca attapañcamo hutvā mahāraṭṭhaṁ gantvā mahānāradakassapajātakakathāya mahāraṭṭhake
anya-e0702n9:4_0: Mahāraṭṭhaṁ isi gantvā, so mahā dhammarakkhito;
anya-e0702n9:6_0: Tattha kira manussā pubbe aggihutādimicchākammaṁ yebhuyyena akaṁsu.
anya-e0702n9:6_2: Tato paṭṭhāya tattha manussā jātaka kathaṁ yebhuyyena sotuṁ ativiya icchanti.
anya-e0702n9:6_4: Visesato pana vassantarajātakakathaṁ te manussā bahūhi dātabbavatthūhi pūjetvā suṇanti.
anya-e0702n9:7_1: teneva syāmaraṭṭhavāsinopi bhikkhū gahaṭṭhāca yebhuyyena sotuṁ icchantīti.
anya-e0702n9:7_2: Mahādhammarakkhitattheropi mahāraṭṭhavāsīhi saddhiṁ sakalasyāmaraṭṭhavāsīnaṁ dhammaṁ desesi,
anya-e0702n9:8_3: Tathā hi nāgasenattheropi yonakaraṭṭhe vasitvā syāmaraṭṭhādīsupi sāsanaṁ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n9:8_5: gantvā tato punāgantvā syāmaraṭṭhe sokkatayanagaraṁ patvā tattha nisīditvā sāsanaṁ paggaṇhitvā pacchā
anya-e0702n9:8_7: Evaṁ yonakaraṭṭhe sāsanaṁ ṭhitaṁ syāmādīsupi ṭhitaṁyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0702n9:9_0: Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānato dvisatādhikānaṁ dvinnaṁ vassasahassānaṁ upari navutime vassa sīhaḷadīpe
anya-e0702n9:9_1: rajjaṁ pattassa kittissirirājasīhamahārājassa abhisekato tatiye vasse teneva kittissirirājasīhamahāraññā
anya-e0702n9:9_5: Evaṁ mahānagarayonakalyāmaraṭṭhesu sāsanaṁ thiraṁ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti veditabbanti.
